description: A temporary dip in temperature calls for cosier knits for Claudia Schiffer, Rachel Bilson and Anne Hathaway.
title: Summer Style | Sweater Weather?
text:
From left, Martin Karius/Splash News; Fern/Splash News; Neil Mockford/FilmMagic, via Getty Images
Maybe itâ€™s the temporary dip in temperature, or the imminent threat of hurricane Irene along the Northeast. Or, maybe women are just looking for an excuse to wear the gorgeous texture-heavy fall sweaters that recently arrived in stores. The actress Anne Hathaway pairs a crochet pattern with a pink tee and conceptual cargos, while Rachel Bilson goes cozy in a nubby cable with baggier boyfriend jeans and Claudia Schiffer takes a leaner approach with leggings and over-the-knee boots.
